product_name: Kate Spade New York Crossbody Bag
product_description: Carry your essentials in sophisticated style with the Kate Spade New York Crossbody Bag by Kate Spade. Expertly crafted from Saffiano leather, Gold-tone hardware and Fabric lining with attention to every detail. The Black, Pink, Cream and Navy options make this Women bag a versatile accessory for All Season occasions from daily commutes to special events.
